channel.title: [ Item Requirements ]
channel.description:
Hey, I was wondering how to make a certain item need certain player rights requirements.
Example - [code]if(wearID == 1) && (playerRights !== 3) { sendMessage("You need to be an administrator to wield this item.");[/code]
I just need the part where the player does not wield it. In the code above, it only sends the message to the player, but the player can still wield it.
Any help will be appreciated! :)

item.title: [ Item Requirements ]
item.dc:creator: @chrham2 chrham2
item.description:
@chrham2 wrote:

if(wearID == 1) && (playerRights !== 3) {
sendMessage(“You need to be an administrator to wield this item.”);
remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3);

Read full topic

item.title: [ Item Requirements ]
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Kira Owner_Kira
item.description:
@Owner_Kira wrote:

jc22493:

I’m trying to add it on a DeltaScape source. It’s fine if you don’t know.

ok, go into the notes folder (i had to do this for membership in my server) then into weapon handler (this will need to to add some vars and boolean’s but this is what i have)

} else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true;

you could do this maybe :

} else if(CLowner == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckowner(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be an owner to equip this item."); GoFalse = true;

Read full topic

item.title: [ Item Requirements ]
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Kira Owner_Kira
item.description:
@Owner_Kira wrote:

if(wearID == 1) && (playerRights !== 3) {
sendMessage(“You have equipped the item for owner’s only.”);
else
if(wearID == -1) && (playerRights !<= 3) {
EDIT: if(wearID == -1) && (playerRights !<= 2) {
sendMessage(“You need to be an administrator to wield this item.”);

ermm i think, im not a pro coder so…i am not sure, its something on the lines of that though.

Read full topic
